hero.title: Welcome to Our Journey
hero.subtitle: Discover how we're revolutionizing e-commerce with quality, innovation, and customer-first values

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, our journey began with a simple vision: to make quality products accessible to everyone. We started from a small garage and have grown into a trusted e-commerce platform serving thousands of customers worldwide.
story.paragraph2: Today, we partner with the best brands and suppliers to bring you an incredible selection of products across multiple categories. Our commitment to excellence has made us a leader in the industry.
story.paragraph3: We believe in transparency, reliability, and putting our customers first. Every product, every interaction, and every experience is designed with you in mind.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide every decision we make and every interaction we have with our customers

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We ensure every product meets our strict quality standards

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constantly evolving to bring you the latest technology

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a thriving community of satisfied customers

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to eco-friendly practices and global responsibility

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: What sets us apart from the competition

reason1.title: Fast & Reliable Shipping
reason1.description: We guarantee timely delivery with real-time tracking for all orders

reason2.title: Secure Shopping
reason2.description: Your data is protected with industry-leading encryption and security measures

reason3.title: Easy Returns
reason3.description: 30-day return policy with no questions asked - we want you to be happy

reason4.title: Customer First
reason4.description: 24/7 customer support ready to help with any questions or concerns

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Talented individuals passionate about delivering excellence
